DOC.brief_summary: Background : The aim study investigate level malondialdehyde ( MDA ) , total antioxidant status ( TAS ) , 8-hydroxy-2´- deoxyguanosine ( 8-OHdG ) blood serum saliva sample female patient chronic periodontitis ( CP ) compare healthy individual . Materials Methods : A total 88 woman four group consist twenty-two subject . Groups design periodontally systemically healthy woman ( PCOS-CP- ) ; periodontally healthy woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) ( PCOS+CP- ) , systemically healthy woman CP ( PCOS- , CP+ ) woman PCOS CP ( PCOS+CP+ ) . Serum salivary sample obtain , clinical periodontal parameter record . MDA , TAS , 8-OHdG level measure biochemically .
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose nonobese PCOS patient Never smoker Had history systemic disease BMI < 25 kg/m2 Participants ≥20 teeth present . Pregnancy Lactation Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) ≥ 6.5 % 2h oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT2h ) ≥200 Cushing syndrome , nonclassic congenital adrenal hyperplasia , hyperprolactinemia , thyroid dysfunction , androgensecreting tumor Any drug use within past 6 month Periodontal treatment within past 6 month
